name: Melee
description: Melee measures a character's Brawling ability in close combat. Shang-Chi, Thor and the Hulk are Famous for their high Melee. It's an important score for characters who like to fight with their fists.

name: Agility
description: Agility represents the ability to Attack at a distance. Spider-Man, Hawkeye and Cyclops are renowned for their high Agility. It's an important score for those who shoot at things or dodge attacks.

name: Resilience
description: Resilience measures a character's stamina, tenacity and pain tolerance. The Thing has an exceptional Resilience. It's an important score for those who regularly wind up in the thick of fights.

name: Vigilance
description: Vigilance represents Situational Awareness, mindfulness and discipline. Shang-Chi and Professor X score high in Vigilance. It's an important score for people who wind up in dangerous spots.

name: Ego
description: Ego measures a character's energy, self-confidence, personal magnetism and force of personality. Doctor Strange has a high Ego. This ability score is vital for leaders of all kinds.

name: Logic
description: Logic represents a character's Powers of reason and insight. Mister Fantastic and Professor X have high Logic scores. It's an important score for the smartest people around.
